conversion_verification.notes: The model represents a clear 3D isometric cutaway transformation of the input floor plan.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D projection. Walls have consistent height and thickness. Minimal perspective distortion on the far corners.

geometric_accuracy.notes: High room-to-room fidelity. Most partitions and wall segments are correctly placed. Minor proportional shortening on the laundry/utility area.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture layout matches the floor plan closely, including sofas, dining sets, and beds in corresponding rooms.

visual_clarity.notes: Geometry is very clean. Points deducted for gibberish text artifacts appearing on floors and walls (E6).

detected_errors.description: Nonsense text labels/artifacts rendered on the floors and wall surfaces.

summary: A high-fidelity 3D conversion that accurately mirrors the 2D layout and furniture arrangement, hindered only by minor text-based artifacts.
